channel.title: Staticpages on inkbottle's site
channel.description: Recent content in Staticpages on inkbottle's site

item.description: Input more_vert Bin oct dec hex forward Output more_vert Bin oct dec hex var input = new Vue({ el: '#conversion', data: { inputValue: '', inputPicked: 2, outputPicked: 16 }, computed:{ outputValue: function(){ return parseInt(this.inputValue, this.inputPicked).toString(this.outputPicked); } }, methods:{ checkRadio: function(value){ return this.outputPicked = value; } } });
